definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The inner ear and the semicircular canal and utricle balance function main balloon.
sentences.chinese: 内耳的半规管以及椭圆囊和球囊主要有平衡功能。

sentences.english: Located within the labyrinth are three semicircular canals that act as angular accelerometers for the head.
sentences.chinese: 在骨迷路上，有3个作为头部角加速度计的半规管。

sentences.english: It was enough for the canal to act as an amplifier for every sound in his body.
sentences.chinese: 这已经足够让半规管作为体内每处声音的放大器了。

definition: ossicles (of the middle ear)/three ossicles, acting as levers to amplify sound, namely: stapes or stirrup bone 鐙骨|镫骨, incus or anvil bone 砧骨, malleus or hammer bone 錘骨|锤骨
chain of ossicles (in the middle ear)
internal auditory meatus (canal in temporal bone of skull housing auditory nerves)
stapes or stirrup bone of middle ear, passing sound vibration to the inner ear
external auditory meatus/auditory canal, between the outer ear 外耳 and tympanum 鼓膜
ossicles (in the middle ear)/also written 聽小骨|听小骨
